text: The Tamási District () is a district in north-western part of Tolna County. Tamási is also the name of the district seat in the Tàmasi District. The Tamási District is located in Southern Transdanubia. == Municipalities == The district has 3 towns, 2 large villages and 27 villages. (ordered by population, as of 1 January 2013) The bolded municipalities are cities, italics municipalities are large villages. == Related pages == * List of cities and towns in Hungary == References == == Other websites == * Postal codes of the Tamási District Category:Districts in Tolna County
title: Tamási District
